title: Reflective Learning-Based Information Literacy Enhancement Program for Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and experience in utilizing documents
context.additional_context: Emphasizing reflective practice for current elementary teachers to solve real-world information problems in their work environment, with smartphone-optimized accessibility design.

learning_goals: Explain at least three criteria—reliability, validity, and appropriateness—for evaluating educational materials
Systematically collect required information through a four-stage search strategy during lesson preparation
Write a self-assessment report based on information utilization experiences at the end of the semester and incorporate peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
